short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your research by curating, organizing & summarizing information from diverse sources effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Often times, when we are researching a topic or fixing that pesky bug, our research spans various tabs and windows.

Keeping track of this information becomes tough and tedious. JourneyTracker not only helps record your knowledge journey, but can also summarize it for you using AI.

Please Note: The Extensions Dashboard features require usage of a '@uwaterloo.ca' account. I.e., you require a University of Waterloo email ID to log into the Dashboard & access feartures like Journey Summarization.

Developed By:
Abhith Krishnan
Talal Jafri
Kabiir Krishna
